title: Frida Kahlo and Diego Rivera
description: A fast breakdown of Frida Kahlo and Diego Rivera for builders.

hook.text: They married, divorced, and married again. Their love was as turbulent and vivid as their paintings.

buildup.text: Frida Kahlo and Diego Rivera were Mexico's most famous artists. They married in 1929 â€” she was 22, he was 42.

discovery.text: Both had affairs. Both were devastated by the other's betrayals. Their marriage was equal parts passion and pain.

twist.text: Frida transformed her suffering into masterpieces. Her self-portraits channeled heartbreak into global cultural icons.

climax.text: Frida and Diego proved that great love isn't always peaceful. Sometimes it's messy, painful, and brilliant.

punchline.text: Frida and Diego's love was chaotic, painful, and brilliant. Like great art.

quiz.question: How many times did Frida and Diego marry each other?
